msg: Set JVM memory options when running jBoss for VlibBeans.

msg: Add JBOSS_OPT variable, to control JVM setting when running jBoss.

msg: Change some method signatures in IEngine and AbstractEngine such that engine has
access to the IRequestCycle when it creates a visit object.
